body:
Indeed. Only 502, 503, 504 are unhealthy for Managed VMs. The docs are now updated:
https://cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/managed-vms/custom-runtimes

> Note: Although 200 is the preferred healthy status code, all other status codes except 502, 503, and 504 are also treated as a healthy response.

I'll update the app to use 503.
